question: Which of the following was the leader of Polygar rebellion in Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu?
explanation: The first Polygar rebellion took place in September 1799 in Trunelveli, Tamil Nadu under the leadership on Kattabomma Nayak also known as Veerapandi Kattobommam. He defied the Britishers for 7 years refusing to accept their suzerainty and pay revenue to them.
